title: Der gestifelte gnar (puss/gnar in puss
body:
I have a funny skin idea for Gnar : Puss/Gnar in boots.

The movie "puss in boots" is realy cool and i think the skin will be too cool

The Normal-gnar attacks: Q= He throw a sword to the enemys and 

W=The rings are gold-rings 

E=with his nice boots he jump normaly


Mega-Gnar: Q= he throw with beans (or if you have a better idea thake your) because in the movie they want beans.

W=normal

E= normal Jump


The skin features: He have a belt were the sword is inside if he doesn't attack.

A funny hat with a feather.

Nice Brown boots.

he have fur like a cat but not to much because gnar so sweet.

Hab jz erst gesehen das das hier deutsch ist xD

replies.body:
ich habe viel dran gesessen (an der idee) Ich bin gnar main also ist es mir das wert 

Hoffe auf faire Bewertung {{champion:150}}
